group_1.textRight: So this "Walnut's" that we're headed to...
Is this the same Walnut's known for its@rice omelets?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, Ria's friends with Manaka, who works@there.
It's possible that Manaka...
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]Uwaaaggghhh?!
[chara:303201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: What was that?!

group_1.textLeft: That voice... [chara:303201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303201:motion_0][chara:303201:cheek_0][chara:303201:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:303201:lipSynch_1]It's Sayuki!

group_1.textRight: Mayu, wait!

group_1.textLeft: I-i-it's g-g-gone... It's gone! It's gone!!!

group_1.textRight: Sayuki! What's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: Mayu...
It's gone... It was stolen.
My treasure... My precious, precious sword @book!

group_1.textRight: It was stolen?
Something important was stolen from you too?!

group_1.textLeft: Yeeesss!
*Sob* It's impossible to get your hands on it@anymore.
It's out of print. "The Complete History@of Swords" was stolen from me.

group_1.textRight: Oh, that book you carry around in place of a@sword. Your treasure...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101301:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]Hm?! I sense some kind of suspicious@presence!

group_1.textRight: What?!

group_1.textLeft: I'll go check it out. Please look after her.

group_1.textRight: Oh, okay! Thank you.
Sayuki, tell me what happened.

group_1.textLeft: Okay... It was just a moment ago.

group_1.textCenter: The day I get to seee everybody♪

group_1.narration: I was so excited that I was singing@on the way to the concert hall.

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]｜￥・＃L％＆＃!!!SHLー！

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:303301:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Eeek?! O-ow...
I...I have to transform and fight back!
Wha? I'm back here again...?
Huh?
It's gone...
Uwaaaggghhh! My sword book is gone?!
(A Familiar! Then it must've been a Witch.)
(What a relief. Ria wasn't the thief after@all!)

group_1.textLeft: I want to go after it, but I have to get to@rehearsal.
I can't keep everyone waiting.

group_1.textRight: Leave it to me, Sayuki.

group_1.textLeft: What? Are you sure?!

group_1.textRight: Of course. I can't just stand by when you@need help.
Not to mention...I have business of my own@with this Witch.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:303301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:303301:cheek_1][chara:303301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:303301:lipSynch_1]Thank you so much!

group_1.textRight: No problem. Go knock their socks off at the@concert.

group_1.textLeft: Will do!

group_1.textCenter: (I wonder if Asuka's okay. She hasn't come@back yet.)

group_1.textLeft: So it was you, Rena?!
N-no! I, uh, didn't do anything wrong.

group_1.textRight: Then why do you look so nervous?

group_1.textLeft: Er, that's because...

group_1.textRight: Because of your guilty conscience perhaps?

group_1.textLeft: No, I-I don't...

group_1.textRight: Asuka!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Mayu! It seems Rena was the culprit!

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Culprit?! [chara:100901:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100901:cheek_0][chara:100901:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:100901:lipSynch_1]You don't have to go that far!
I just saw Sayu-Sayu and―

group_1.textRight: "Sayu-Sayu"? What's that?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! You don't even know who Sayu-Sayu is?
"I'll slash my way into your heart!"

group_1.textRight: "It's me, your beloved blade-bearing@beauty. Sayuki Fumino, [chara:303201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:303201:motion_200][chara:303201:cheek_0][chara:303201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:303201:lipSynch_1]cutting in!"

group_1.textLeft: Eeeeee! Sayu-Sayu! You can slash me anytime@you want!

group_1.textRight: [chara:101301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What...what's going on?!
Sayuki is a pop singer at the height of her@career right now.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, where did Sayu-Sayu go?!
Nooo... I was hoping to get one for Momoko@too.

group_1.textRight: Huh? Oh, right! [chara:101301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101301:cheek_0][chara:101301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:101301:lipSynch_1]Return what you've stolen at@once!

group_1.textLeft: Stolen? What are you talking about?

group_1.textRight: It's too late to feign ignorance.
Admit your guilt here and now, or face your@judgment!
[chara:303201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Uh... What?!

group_1.textLeft: Geeze, fine then.
I accept your challenge! I was in the mood@for a fight anyway, ya know.

group_1.textRight: P-please stop! I'm sure this is all just a@misunderstanding!
